item.title: vMWare - Setup vcsim (vCenter Simulator)
item.description: Overview Usage Overview This package implements a vSphere Web Services (SOAP) SDK endpoint intended for testing consumers of the API. While the mock framework is written in the Go language, it can be used by any language that can talk to the vSphere API. See their github for more info. Usage To run vcsim using docker run the following: docker run -p 8989:8989 vmware/vcsim:latest To test functionality of the container you can run the following command.
